        public java.io.OutputStream newOutputStream()
                                     throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:

        public void commit()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Commits this edit so it is visible to readers. This releases the edit lock so another edit may be started on the same key.

        java.io.IOException
